atoms_positions.description: list of atomyc symbols and cartesian coordinates

k_points_conditions.description: list of K Points in the first Brillouin zone identifying the path along which the bands are computed

pdoss.description: projected density of states objects container

absolute_magnetisation.description: output value of the absolute magnetisation

fermi_dirac_temperature.description: temperature used for broadening in case of Fermi-Dirac broadening function for fractional occupation of orbitals

force_multiplicity.description: if true multiplicity is constrained to the input value in a calculation with broadening of the occupation of orbitals

initial_spin_guesses.description: initial value of the magnetisation for each atom

net_charge.description: difference between electronic and ionic charge of the system (+1 means one electron is being removed from the neutral charge system)

output_hirshfeld_population_analysis.description: charges and magnetic momentum for each atom resulting from Hirshfeld population analysis

output_mulliken_population_analysis.description: charges and magnetic momentum for each atom resulting from Mulliken population analysis

scf_convergence_threshold.description: threshold for the convergence of the wave function

smearing.description: energy value for electron broadening function for fractional occupation of orbitals

spin_polarised_calculation.description: whether spin polarisation calculation is considered

total_magnetisation.description: output value of the total magnetisation

total_spin_squared.description: output value of the eigenvalue of the square operator to control spin contamination

xc_functional.description: approximation used for the exchanged correlation functional

force_convergence_threshold.description: maximum force allowed on each atom before the optimisation is converged

geometry_constraints.description: geometrical constraints defined in the simulation

energies.description: energy of each replica of the system identifying the minimum energy path

energy_barrier.description: difference in energy between the initial geometry and the transition state geometry

geometry_constraints.description: geometrical constraints defined in the simulation

geometry_constraints_increments.description: increments used to vary some of the constraints in case the constrained geometry optimisation method is used

number_geometries.description: number of geometries that eventually form the minimum energy path (Could be more than the input geometries)

backward_sweep.description: whether one wants to measure the backward (return) sweep or the forward only

bias_spectroscopy_reset_bias.description: reset bias to the initial value (before starting the sweep) at the end of the spectroscopy measurement

end_settling_time.description: time to wait after the sweep has finished and the bias is ramped to the initial value

first_settling_time.description: additional time to wait (in addition to the Settling Time) after the bias has ramped to the starting point of the sweep

integration_time.description: time during which the data are acquired and averaged

lock_in_harmonics.description: order of the harmonic oscillation to detect on the demodulated signal

lock_in_hp_filter_cutoffs.description: cutoff frequency of the high-pass filter applied on the demodulation signal

lock_in_hp_filter_orders.description: filter order of the high-pass filter applied on the demodulation signal

lock_in_lp_filter_cutoffs.description: cutoff frequency of the low-pass filter applied on the demodulation signal

lock_in_lp_filter_orders.description: filter order of the low-pass filter applied on the demodulation signal

lock_in_modulated_signal.description: signal on which the modulation (sine) will be added

lock_in_reference_phases.description: reference phase for the sine on the demodulated signal with respect to the modulation signal

lock_in_status.description: if lock-in is on or not

lock_in_sync_filter.description: if use sync filter (Operates after the low-pass filter and averages the demodulated signals over one period of the modulation frequency

max_slew_rate.description: max rate at which the bias changes (before, during and after sweeping)

num_sweeps.description: number of sweeps to measure and average

record_final_z.description: record the Z position during Z averaging time at the end of the sweep (after Z control time)

settling_time.description: time to wait after changing the bias to the next level and before starting to acquire data

z_avg_time.description: duration between which the Z position is recorded and averaged before and after the sweep

z_control_time.description: time during which the Z-controller is enabled once a sweep has finished

z_controller_switch_off_delay.description: time delay applied when switching off feedback loop

z_controller_tip_lift.description: position of the tip when feedback loop is off

z_spectroscopy_reset_z.description: reset the Z position at the end of the sweep to the initial averaged value calculated during Z averaging time at Max slew rate

z_spectroscopy_time_between_forward_back.description: time to wait in seconds between the forward and the backward sweep

one_ten.description: Whether the input is attenuated by a factor of ten

output_add.description: whether to add the signal at the ADD connector of the OC4 to the output signal

atomic_selections.description: list of group of atoms on which projections of the orbitals are computed

energies.description: energy of each replica of the system identifying the minimum energy path

orbitals_selections.description: amplitude of each gas phase orbital for a portion of the system on the orbitals of the full system

plot_group_by.description: group by index or by periodic element

amplitude_excitation_ratio.description: amplitude to excitation ratio at the resonance

demodulation_bw_amp.description: demodulation bandwidth of the amplitude controller

demodulation_bw_pha.description: demodulation bandwidth of the phase controller

drift_correction_status.description: whether the drift correction is performed

atoms_positions.description: list of atomyc symbols and cartesian coordinates

k_points_conditions.description: list of K Points in the first Brillouin zone identifying the path along which the bands are computed

location_after.description: location of the sample after the transfer

location_before.description: location of the sample before the transfer

constant_current.description: isovalue of charged density at which the constant current image is produced

constant_height.description: distance from the surface at which the constant Z image is simulated

de.description: step between the E-min and E-max

e_max.description: energy of the highest orbital included in the calculation

e_min.description: energy of the lowest orbital included in the calculation

z_controller_switch_off_delay.description: time delay applied when switching off feedback loop

z_controller_tip_lift.description: position of the tip when feedback loop is off

UHVComponentTypeEnum.description: ultra high vacuum component type values
UHVComponentTypeEnum.title: UHVComponentTypeEnum

pdoss.description: projected density of states objects container
